title: Flight Simulator 2020 - Addon spotlight - Hawker Hunter package - version 1.2
description:
If you are a fan of old jets the Hawker Hunter is something you might be interested in. A package has been released late last month which includes 10 different version of the Hawker Hunter aircraft. In this video we will focus only on one specifically but the whole package contains more versions of the aircraft. 

0:00 intro
0:10 review different versions
3:10 reviewing the exterior and interior
8:18 taking the jet out for a flight

If you also want to give the aircraft a try you can download it from the site below:
https://flightsim.to/file/35150/hawker-hunter-package
